snippet: How much power drives the Cadillac ELR? It depends on what you mean by power. And by drives.
abstract: Product information for Cadillac ELR lists 2017 horsepower as 'total system power,' measure of engine power plus battery power; car actually has maximum 181 in propulsion power.
lead_paragraph: How much power drives the Cadillac ELR? It depends on what you mean by power. And by drives.
